00056 InstructionQueue::InstructionQueue() :
00057   autoQualAssess(true),
00058   vertexSlaverCount(0),
00059   nbPreConditionners(0),
00060   isMasterSet(false),
00061   masterInstrIndex(0)
00062 {
00063 }
00064 
00065 InstructionQueue::~InstructionQueue() {}
00066 
00067 void InstructionQueue::add_target_calculator( TargetWriter* tc, MsqError& )
00068 {
00069   instructions.push_back( tc );
00070 }
00071 
00072 void InstructionQueue::add_vertex_slaver( VertexSlaver* vs, MsqError& )
00073 {
00074   instructions.push_front( vs );
00075   if (isMasterSet)
00076     ++masterInstrIndex;
00077   ++vertexSlaverCount;
00078   set_slaved_ho_node_mode( Settings::SLAVE_CALCULATED );
00079 }
00080 
00081 void InstructionQueue::remove_vertex_slaver( VertexSlaver* vs, MsqError& err)
00082 {
00083   size_t idx = 0;
00084   for (std::list<Instruction*>::iterator i = instructions.begin();
00085        i != instructions.end(); ++i, ++idx) {
00086     if (*i == vs) {
00087       instructions.erase(i);
00088       if (isMasterSet && masterInstrIndex > idx)
00089         --masterInstrIndex;
00090       if (--vertexSlaverCount == 0) 
00091         set_slaved_ho_node_mode( Settings::SLAVE_ALL );
00092       return;
00093     }
00094   }
00095   
00096   MSQ_SETERR(err)("Not found", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
00097 }
00098 
00099 void InstructionQueue::add_tag_vertex_mesh( TagVertexMesh* vs, MsqError& )
00100 {
00101   instructions.push_front( vs );
00102   if (isMasterSet)
00103     ++masterInstrIndex;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void InstructionQueue::remove_tag_vertex_mesh( TagVertexMesh* vs, MsqError& err)
00107 {
00108   size_t idx = 0;
00109   for (std::list<Instruction*>::iterator i = instructions.begin();
00110        i != instructions.end(); ++i, ++idx) {
00111     if (*i == vs) {
00112       instructions.erase(i);
00113       if (isMasterSet && masterInstrIndex > idx)
00114         --masterInstrIndex;
00115       return;
00116     }
00117   }
00118   
00119   MSQ_SETERR(err)("Not found", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
00120 }
00121 
00130 void InstructionQueue::add_preconditioner(QualityImprover* instr,
00131                                         MsqError &err)
00132 {
00133   if (isMasterSet) {
00134     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot add preconditioners once the master "
00135                     "QualityImprover has been set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00136     return;
00137   }
00138   
00139   instructions.push_back(instr);
00140   nbPreConditionners++;
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00150 void InstructionQueue::remove_preconditioner(size_t index, MsqError &err)
00151 {
00152   // checks index is valid
00153   if ( isMasterSet && index == masterInstrIndex ) {
00154     MSQ_SETERR(err)("cannot remove master QualityImprover.", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00155     return;
00156   } else if (index >= instructions.size() ) {
00157     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Index points beyond end of list.",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00158     return;
00159   }
00160   
00161   // position the instruction iterator over the preconditioner to delete
00162   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator pos;
00163   pos = instructions.begin();
00164   std::advance(pos, index);
00165 
00166   if (!dynamic_cast<QualityImprover*>(*pos)) 
00167   {
00168     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Index does not point to a QualityImprover.",
00169                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00170     return;
00171   }
00172   
00173   std::string name = (*pos)->get_name();
00174   instructions.erase(pos);
00175   nbPreConditionners--;
00176 }  
00177 
00178 
00187 void InstructionQueue::insert_preconditioner(QualityImprover* instr,
00188                                            size_t index, MsqError &err)
00189 {
00190   // checks index is valid
00191   if (isMasterSet==true && index > masterInstrIndex) {
00192     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot add a preconditioner after the master "
00193                     "QualityImprover.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00194     return;
00195   }
00196   if (index >= instructions.size() ) {
00197     MSQ_SETERR(err)("index", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00198     return;
00199   }
00200 
00201   // position the instruction iterator
00202   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator pos;
00203   pos = instructions.begin();
00204   std::advance(pos, index);
00205   // adds the preconditioner
00206   instructions.insert(pos,instr);
00207   nbPreConditionners++;
00208 }

00217                                             MsqError &/*err*/)
00218 {
00219   instructions.push_back(instr);
00220 }

00229 void InstructionQueue::remove_quality_assessor(size_t index, MsqError &err)
00230 {
00231   // checks index is valid
00232   if (index >= instructions.size() ) {
00233     MSQ_SETERR(err)("index", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00234     return;
00235   }
00236   
00237   // position the instruction iterator over the QualityAssessor to delete
00238   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator pos;
00239   pos = instructions.begin();
00240   std::advance(pos, index);
00241 
00242   if ( !dynamic_cast<QualityAssessor*>(*pos) ) 
00243   {
00244     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Index does not point to a QualityImprover.",
00245                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00246     return;
00247   }
00248   
00249   std::string name = (*pos)->get_name();
00250   instructions.erase(pos);
00251 }

00261 void InstructionQueue::insert_quality_assessor(QualityAssessor* instr,
00262                                            size_t index, MsqError &err)
00263 {
00264   // checks index is valid
00265   if (index > instructions.size()) {
00266     MSQ_SETERR(err)("index points two positions beyond end of list.",
00267                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00268     return;
00269   }
00270 
00271   // position the instruction iterator
00272   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator pos;
00273   pos = instructions.begin();
00274   std::advance(pos, index);
00275   // adds the QualityAssessor
00276   instructions.insert(pos,instr);
00277 }
00278 
00279 
00280 void InstructionQueue::set_master_quality_improver(QualityImprover* instr,
00281                                                  MsqError &err)
00282 {
00283   if (isMasterSet) {
00284     MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "InstructionQueue::set_master_quality_improver():\n"
00285         << "\tOverwriting previously specified master quality improver.\n";
00286     // if master is already set, clears it and insert the new one at the same position.
00287     std::list<Instruction*>::iterator master_pos;
00288     master_pos = this->clear_master(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00289     instructions.insert(master_pos, instr);
00290     isMasterSet = true;
00291   } else {
00292     // if master is not set, add it at the end of the queue.
00293     instructions.push_back(instr);
00294     isMasterSet = true;
00295     masterInstrIndex = instructions.size()-1;
00296   }
00297 }
00298 
00299   
00300 void InstructionQueue::run_common( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00301                                    ParallelMesh* pmesh, 
00302                                    Settings* settings,
00303                                    MsqError &err)
00304 { 
00305   MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << version_string(false) << "\n";
00306 
00307   if (nbPreConditionners != 0 && isMasterSet == false ) {
00308     MSQ_SETERR(err)("no pre-conditionners allowed if master QualityImprover "
00309                     "is not set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00310     return;
00311   }
00312   
00313 #ifdef ENABLE_INTERRUPT
00314    // Register SIGINT handler
00315   MsqInterrupt msq_interrupt;
00316 #endif
00317 
00318   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00319   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00320 
00321     // Generate SIGFPE on floating point errors
00322   MsqFPE fpe_trap( settings->trap_floating_point_exception() );
00323   
00324   std::list<Instruction*>::const_iterator instr;
00325   
00326     // Initialize each instruction
00327   for (instr = instructions.begin(); instr != instructions.end(); ++instr) 
00328   {
00329     if (MsqInterrupt::interrupt())
00330     {
00331       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERRUPTED);
00332       return;
00333     }
00334     
00335     (*instr)->initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); 
00336     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00337   }
00338   
00339     // Run each instruction
00340   for (instr = instructions.begin(); instr != instructions.end(); ++instr) 
00341   {
00342     if (MsqInterrupt::interrupt())
00343     {
00344       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERRUPTED);
00345       return;
00346     }
00347     
00348     if (pmesh) {
00349       assert(!mesh || pmesh == mesh);
00350       (*instr)->loop_over_mesh( pmesh, domain, settings, err ); 
00351     }
00352     else {
00353       (*instr)->loop_over_mesh( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); 
00354     }
00355     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00356   }
00357 }
00358 
00359 void InstructionQueue::clear()
00360 {
00361   instructions.clear();
00362   autoQualAssess = true;
00363   isMasterSet = false;
00364   masterInstrIndex = 0;
00365 }
00366 
00367 
00368 std::list<Instruction*>::iterator InstructionQueue::clear_master(MsqError &err)
00369 {
00370   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator instr_iter;
00371   std::list<Instruction*>::iterator master_pos;
00372   
00373   if (!isMasterSet) {
00374     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No master quality improver to clear.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00375     return instr_iter;
00376   }
00377   
00378     // position the instruction iterator over the master quality improver
00379   master_pos = instructions.begin();
00380   std::advance(master_pos, masterInstrIndex);
00381   
00382     // erases the master quality improver
00383   instr_iter = instructions.erase(master_pos);
00384   isMasterSet = false;
00385   
00386     // returns the position where the Master was
00387   return instr_iter;
00388 }
